author: Christopher Morley
message: There is only one success to be able to spend your life in your own way.
title: Thought of the day

author: Hannah Arendt
message: Promises are the uniquely human way of ordering the future, making it predictable and reliable to the extent that this is humanly possible.
title: Thought of the day

author: Alan Cohen
message: Appreciation is the highest form of prayer, for it acknowledges the presence of good wherever you shine the light of your thankful thoughts.
title: Thought of the day

author: Aldous Huxley
message: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
title: Thought of the day
